title: AI Tax Assistant
description: Ask questions about tax laws, deductions, and filing procedures
welcomeMessage: Hello! I'm your AI tax assistant. How can I help you with your tax-related questions?

examples.title: Example questions
questions: What are the tax slabs for FY 2023-24?
How do I claim HRA exemption?
What documents do I need for ITR filing?
What is the difference between old and new tax regimes?

errors.failed: Failed to get a response. Please try again.
errors.network: Network error. Please check your connection.
